chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp ls -> pl_non_empty_path_true_def_0 plp ls -> plp <> pl_path_nil -> pl_non_empty_path_true_def_0 plp (prec_cons a la ls)

Premises:
Inductive pl_path_incl : pl_path -> prec_list -> Prop := pl_path_incl_nil : pl_path_incl pl_path_nil prec_empty | pl_path_incl_cons : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp la -> pl_path_incl (pl_path_cons a plp) (prec_cons a la ls) | pl_path_incl_next : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp ls -> plp <> pl_path_nil -> pl_path_incl plp (prec_cons a la ls)
ad = N : Set
Inductive pl_path : Set := pl_path_nil : pl_path | pl_path_cons : ad -> pl_path -> pl_path
Inductive prec_list : Set := prec_cons : ad -> prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list | prec_empty : prec_list
pl_non_empty_path_true_def_0 = fun (pl : pl_path) (p : prec_list) => forall m : Map bool, pl_path_incl pl p -> pl_path_true pl m -> pl_non_empty m p = true : pl_path -> prec_list -> Prop
pl_non_empty_path_true_1 : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp la -> pl_non_empty_path_true_def_0 plp la -> pl_non_empty_path_true_def_0 (pl_path_cons a plp) (prec_cons a la ls)
pl_path_incl_next : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp ls -> plp <> pl_path_nil -> pl_path_incl plp (prec_cons a la ls)
pl_path_rec_equiv_1_2 : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp ls -> pl_path_rec_equiv_1_def plp ls -> plp <> pl_path_nil -> pl_path_rec_equiv_1_def plp (prec_cons a la ls)
pl_path_incl_length_2 : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp ls -> pl_path_incl_length_def plp ls -> plp <> pl_path_nil -> pl_path_incl_length_def plp (prec_cons a la ls)
Inductive pl_path_incl : pl_path -> prec_list -> Prop := pl_path_incl_nil : pl_path_incl pl_path_nil prec_empty | pl_path_incl_cons : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp la -> pl_path_incl (pl_path_cons a plp) (prec_cons a la ls) | pl_path_incl_next : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp ls -> plp <> pl_path_nil -> pl_path_incl plp (prec_cons a la ls)
pl_path_incl_ind : forall P : pl_path -> prec_list -> Prop, P pl_path_nil prec_empty -> (forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp la -> P plp la -> P (pl_path_cons a plp) (prec_cons a la ls)) -> (forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp ls -> P plp ls -> plp <> pl_path_nil -> P plp (prec_cons a la ls)) -> forall (p : pl_path) (p0 : prec_list), pl_path_incl p p0 -> P p p0
pl_path_incl_length_1 : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp la -> pl_path_incl_length_def plp la -> pl_path_incl_length_def (pl_path_cons a plp) (prec_cons a la ls)
pl_path_rec_equiv_1_1 : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp la -> pl_path_rec_equiv_1_def plp la -> pl_path_rec_equiv_1_def (pl_path_cons a plp) (prec_cons a la ls)
pl_path_incl_cons : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp la -> pl_path_incl (pl_path_cons a plp) (prec_cons a la ls)
pl_path_incl_length : forall (plp : pl_path) (pl : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_path_incl plp pl -> signature.pl_tl_length pl n -> pl_path_length plp = n
pl_path_rec_equiv_1 : forall (plp : pl_path) (pl : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp pl -> forall (d : preDTA) (tl : term_list) (n : nat), pl_path_recon d tl plp -> signature.pl_tl_length pl n -> liste_reconnait d pl tl
pl_path_incl_length_def = fun (plp : pl_path) (pl : prec_list) => forall n : nat, pl_path_incl plp pl -> signature.pl_tl_length pl n -> pl_path_length plp = n : pl_path -> prec_list -> Prop
pl_path_rec_equiv_1_def = fun (plp : pl_path) (pl : prec_list) => pl_path_incl plp pl -> forall (d : preDTA) (tl : term_list) (n : nat), pl_path_recon d tl plp -> signature.pl_tl_length pl n -> liste_reconnait d pl tl : pl_path -> prec_list -> Prop
pl_path_rec_length : forall (plp : pl_path) (tl : term_list) (d : preDTA), pl_path_recon d tl plp -> pl_path_length plp = lst_length tl
pl_path_rec_equiv_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list), liste_reconnait d pl tl -> exists plp : pl_path, pl_path_incl plp pl /\ pl_path_recon d tl plp
pl_path_rec_equiv_0_def = fun (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list) => liste_reconnait d pl tl -> exists plp : pl_path, pl_path_incl plp pl /\ pl_path_recon d tl plp : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop
pl_path_rec_cons : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (plp : pl_path) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a t -> pl_path_recon d tl plp -> pl_path_recon d (tcons t tl) (pl_path_cons a plp)
Inductive pl_path_recon : preDTA -> term_list -> pl_path -> Prop := pl_path_rec_nil : forall d : preDTA, pl_path_recon d tnil pl_path_nil | pl_path_rec_cons : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (plp : pl_path) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a t -> pl_path_recon d tl plp -> pl_path_recon d (tcons t tl) (pl_path_cons a plp)
signature.pl_tl_propag : forall (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (n : nat), signature.pl_tl_length la n -> signature.pl_tl_length ls (S n) -> signature.pl_tl_length (prec_cons a la ls) (S n)
semantic_equiv_1_4_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (l : term_list) (n : nat), l <> tnil -> rec_list_terms d ls l n = true -> rec_list_terms d (prec_cons a la ls) l (S n) = true
pl_path_recon_ind : forall P : preDTA -> term_list -> pl_path -> Prop, (forall d : preDTA, P d tnil pl_path_nil) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (plp : pl_path) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a t -> pl_path_recon d tl plp -> P d tl plp -> P d (tcons t tl) (pl_path_cons a plp)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (t : term_list) (p0 : pl_path), pl_path_recon p t p0 -> P p t p0
pl_path_length = fix pl_path_length (plp : pl_path) : nat := match plp with | pl_path_nil => 0 | pl_path_cons _ p => S (pl_path_length p) end : pl_path -> nat
signature.pl_tl_length_rec_3 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), liste_reconnait d ls (tcons hd tl) -> signature.pl_tl_length_rec_def_1 d ls (tcons hd tl) -> signature.pl_tl_length_rec_def_1 d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
pl_path_rec_equiv_0_2 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), liste_reconnait d ls (tcons hd tl) -> pl_path_rec_equiv_0_def d ls (tcons hd tl) -> pl_path_rec_equiv_0_def d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
liste_rec_length_2 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), liste_reconnait d ls (tcons hd tl) -> liste_rec_length_def d ls (tcons hd tl) -> liste_rec_length_def d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
liste_reconnait_ind : forall P : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop, (forall d : preDTA, P d prec_empty tnil) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd -> liste_reconnait d la tl -> P d la tl -> P d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), liste_reconnait d ls (tcons hd tl) -> P d ls (tcons hd tl) -> P d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> P p p0 t
signature.pl_compatible_cons_r : forall (p : prec_list) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), signature.pl_compatible p (prec_cons a la ls) -> exists (a0 : ad) (la0 ls0 : prec_list), p = prec_cons a0 la0 ls0
signature.pl_compatible_cons_l : forall (p : prec_list) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), signature.pl_compatible (prec_cons a la ls) p -> exists (a0 : ad) (la0 ls0 : prec_list), p = prec_cons a0 la0 ls0
signature.pl_tl_length_ind : forall P : prec_list -> nat -> Prop, P prec_empty 0 -> (forall (a : ad) (pl : prec_list) (n : nat), signature.pl_tl_length pl n -> P pl n -> P (prec_cons a pl prec_empty) (S n)) -> (forall (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (n : nat), signature.pl_tl_length la n -> P la n -> signature.pl_tl_length ls (S n) -> P ls (S n) -> P (prec_cons a la ls) (S n)) -> forall (p : prec_list) (n : nat), signature.pl_tl_length p n -> P p n
rec_consn : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), liste_reconnait d ls (tcons hd tl) -> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
